EmailTemplate.name: Webinar - Mobile Testing with Tosca Testsuite and MobileLabs - 2015.06.16.Email
EmailTemplate.subject: Sorry we missed you at our Mobile Testing with Tosca Testsuite and Mobile Labs webinar.
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Mobile Testing with Tosca Testsuite and Mobile Labs
Hi {{lead.First Name}},
Sorry we missed you at our recent webinar, Mobile Testing with Tosca Testsuite and Mobile Labs! In the webinar, guest Mobile Labs Vice President, Paul O’Callaghan and Tricentis Product Manager Georg Thurner, shared how to use the power of Mobile Labs in conjunction with Tosca to centralize your device management and test all mobile devices.
If you would like to see what you missed, a recording of our webinar is available here <http://www.tricentis.com/thank-you-page-mobile-testing-with-tosca-testsuite-and-mobile-labs>.
If you would like to stay up to date, please follow us on Twitter @Tricentis <https://twitter.com/Tricentis>. For any additional questions, please feel free to follow and tweet our Support Team @TricentisSpprt <https://twitter.com/TricentisSpprt>.
Best regards, The Tricentis Webinar Team
Paul O’Callaghan Vice President, Global Alliances and International Sales Operations Mobile Labs
Georg Thurner Product Manager Tricentis
